wavelet analysis
[function for interpolation (func)]


Functions

int surfit::func_get_details_level ()
 returns the depth of wavelet decomposition of surfit_func
bool surfit::func_decomp ()
 makes one wavelet-decomposition for surfit_func
bool surfit::func_auto_decomp (REAL eps)
 calls func_decomp() until difference between calc_approx_norm() will be lower than eps
bool surfit::func_recons ()
 makes one wavelet-reconstruction for surfit_func
bool surfit::func_full_recons ()
 makes all possible wavelet-reconstruction (recontructs original function)
int surfit::wfunc_get_details_level ()
 returns the depth of wavelet decomposition of surfit_wfunc
